taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus idaeobatus;section idaeanthi;species idaeus;variety eucyclus;

treatment.discussion: This and var. Egglestonii N. Am, counterparts of the rare European var. anomalus, reversionary variants with rounded leaves and leaflets and mostly sterile.
—X R. neglectus Peck (neglected), a series of plants, obviously crosses between R. idaeus, var. strigosus and no. 10, is occasional where the ranges of the two coincide.
